titles.title: To reinstate the license and extend commencement of construction deadlines for the Carlyle Hydroelectric Project in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/16/2002--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to reinstate the license for the Carlyle Hydroelectric Project in the State of Illinois, and extend the time required for commencement of its construction for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods.
